00036 template <int N>
00037 class Core : public Core<N-1> {
00038 public:
00039     typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> ND;                    
00040     typedef Core<N-1> Super;                           
00041     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<Core> Ptr;            
00042     typedef boost::intrusive_ptr<Core const> ConstPtr;

00047         Vector<int,M> const & shape,

00051         return Ptr(new Core(shape, strides, manager),false);
00052     }

00085     template <int M>
00086     int computeOffset(Vector<int,M> const & index) const {
00087         return index[M-N] * this->getStride() + Super::computeOffset(index);
00088     }
00089 
00091     template <int M>
00092     void fillShape(Vector<int,M> & shape) const {
00093         shape[M-N] = this->getSize();
00094         Super::fillShape(shape);
00095     }
00096 
00098     template <int M>
00099     void fillStrides(Vector<int,M> & strides) const {
00100         strides[M-N] = this->getStride();
00101         Super::fillStrides(strides);
00102     }
00103 
00105     int getNumElements() const {
00106         return getSize() * Super::getNumElements();
00107     }
00108     
00109 protected:
00110 
00111     template <int M>
00112     Core (
00113         Vector<int,M> const & shape,
00114         Vector<int,M> const & strides, 
00115         Manager::Ptr const & manager
00116     ) : Super(shape, strides, manager), _size(shape[M-N]), _stride(strides[M-N]) {}
00117

00119     Core (
00120         Vector<int,M> const & shape,
00121         Manager::Ptr const & manager
00122     ) : Super(shape, manager), _size(shape[M-N]), _stride(Super::getStride() * Super::getSize()) {}
00123 
00124     Core (
00125         Manager::Ptr const & manager
00126     ) : Super(manager), _size(0), _stride(0) {}
00127 
00128     Core(Core const & other) : Super(other), _size(other._size), _stride(other._stride) {}
